mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (userEmailHost, postNo, postTitle, postContent, postTimestamp, userEmailGuest) VALUES ( #{userEmailHost}, #{postNo}, #{postTitle}, #{postContent}, #{postTimestamp}, #{userEmailGuest} )
mapper.select: SELECT userEmailHost, postNo, postTitle, postContent, postTimestamp, userEmailGuest FROM post WHERE userEmailHost = #{userEmail} ORDER BY postTimestamp DESC, postNo DESC
